description: This file contains CRUD functions for categories, brands, and products in an e-commerce platform, interfacing with SQLAlchemy ORM models.

methods.name: List[Category] list_categories(db: Session)
methods.description: Lists all categories ordered by name.

methods.name: Category create_category(db: Session, name: str, description: str | None = None)
methods.description: Creates a new category with optional description.

methods.name: List[Brand] list_brands(db: Session)
methods.description: Lists all brands ordered by name.

methods.name: Brand create_brand(db: Session, name: str, description: str | None = None)
methods.description: Creates a new brand with optional description.

methods.name: List[Product] list_products(db: Session)
methods.description: Lists all products ordered by most recent id.

methods.name: Product create_product( db: Session, name: str, description: str | None, price_cents: int, currency: str, stock: int, image_url: str | None, category_id: int | None, brand_id: int | None, )
methods.description: Creates a new product with various attributes including name, description, price, stock, and associated category and brand ids.

ctags.name: create_brand
ctags.pattern: /^def create_brand(db: Session, name: str, description: str | None = None) -> Brand:$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, name: str, description: str | None = None)

ctags.name: create_category
ctags.pattern: /^def create_category(db: Session, name: str, description: str | None = None) -> Category:$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, name: str, description: str | None = None)

ctags.name: create_product
ctags.signature: ( db: Session, name: str, description: str | None, price_cents: int, currency: str, stock: int, image_url: str | None, category_id: int | None, brand_id: int | None, )
